name: You CANS Do It!
description:
1) LEFT CLICK on an ACTION CARD to select it.

2) LEFT CLICK on one of your UNITS to select it.

3) LEFT CLICK on a TILE or ENEMY UNIT to perform the selected action using the selected UNIT.

Note: RIGHT CLICK an ACTION CARD to discard it.

USE or DISCARD all your ACTION CARDS to end your turn.

This game was developed for the Wowie Jam 3.0 and the theme was "Failure is Progress."

You have a limited number of card slots available, shared by both units and actions.

If a unit dies, its card is removed from your slots, but now a new slot is free to be filled by another action card.

Losing a unit means you get more actions to perform on your turn.

Illustrations: Froyuh

3D Models: Tadeocore

Development: AndrewDavidJ

Music & Sound: Tronz
